name: 69 Cindy Love
description:
69 Cindy Love is a fun puzzle game. The game allows you to enjoy the everyday life situations of the beautiful young girl Cindy. Relaxing music and meditative gameplay will allow you to have a good rest after work.
Features
14 Levels with Full HD Artwork
Relaxing music
Meditative gameplay
14 Achievements
Take the candy! And have a fun!
